dmca.title: LiveJournal provides courtesy warning to allegedly infringing user
dmca.body:
Dear LiveJournal user [private],



We have received a report, properly formatted under the provisions set forth by United States law, indicating that your entries located at http://www.livejournal.com/users/[user]/729.html and http://www.livejournal.com/users/[user]/1569.html violate the copyright of another person. As such, we must request that you remove these entries as soon as possible, but no later than 0:01 AM EST, Jan. 17, 2006, to avoid further action against your account.


If you feel that this report is in error and that your use of the material is allowed under copyright law, you are entitled to file a counter-notification, also under the provisions of US law; please contact us for information on how to do this. Filing a counter-notification indicates that you are willing to defend yourself in a court of law against a claim of copyright infringement.



Regards,

[private]

LiveJournal Abuse Team
